entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023
